title: ‘Don’t Want to Be One of Those Grumpy Old Guys’: Geraint Thomas Says Time is Right for Tour de France Swan Song
content:
The 2018 yellow jersey champ Thomas eyes one last big ride, hints at future role at Ineos Grenadiers: 'I've got a lot to offer.'
